scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir dist/scripts && touch dist/scripts/app.js
scripts.serve: yarn clean && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && yarn babel-watch && yarn server
scripts.dev-build: yarn clean && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && yarn babel-build
scripts.dev-deploy: yarn dev-build && cd dist && git add --all && git commit -m "Dev-build at $(date)" && git push
